Reclusa::

She grinned. "Yes, and what a flawless job he has done too."  She
moved her hands on her hips. "A hunter must ave every advantage
available to them. Don't you think?"




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Hydras:
> 
> "Yess, Yesss"hissed the male while he walked around looking to femme
looking carfully the femme"I guess that Perceptor have done this new
look for you"
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Dark Mouse 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Sunday, April 10, 2005 10:48 PM
>   Subject: Re: Reclusa
> 
> 
> 
>   Reclusa::
> 
>   She stook with her head held high. Her knew shiney chocolate brown
>   skin glistened in the room lights.  Her red optics glowed with pride
>   as her spider legs fanned out behind her giving a fan like appearence,
>   only to enhance her regal stance.  The new built in shields gave only
>   the slightest vibration when activated and she had new photosonic
>   pistol blasters on her hips.  The new blasters could, if focused on a
>   single point long enough, melt most metals since it not only used
>   energy, but sound to create it's blasts, disrupting an object on an
>   atomic level.  Her new venom was even more potent, and her webs were
>   now three times thier strength.  Despite the improvements, she still
>   could mix web and venom to create explosives. BUt the one drawback to
>   all this was that her mech fluid was very acidic and would eventually
>   disintegrate her internal systems. But no one could of her long term
>   death sentence, not her or her up grader. 
> 
>   She showed her new form proudly. "I hope you like it."
